attributes.action: Scottish National Self Determenation And Referendum right.
attributes.additional_details:
We the Scottish people petition the UK Government to allow the Scottish government the right to choose when a legally binding referendum on independence should be held in line with UN policies of National Self Determination granting the people of Scotland the right to decide whether or not they want independence.

Respect Scottish Democracy and allow the Scottish government to hold the legally binding referendum in the Second half of the Scottish Parliament as per its election pledge.  Also stop stating this is damaging the Scottish economy as there is no proof it is damaging the Scottish economy companies continue to invest the damage is cause by UK Government Cuts. Let the people of Scotland choose its future when and where they want!
